cast.name: 蒂莫西·李·德普利斯特 Timothy Lee DePriest

this_title: Room 37 - The Mysterious Death of Johnny Thunders
trans_title: 37号房间：约翰尼·雷德斯神秘之死
introduction: Famed rock and roll guitarist Johnny Thunders arrives in New Orleans to get his life together after a toll of hardships, but instead falls into a dark journey and trail of events that are based on his real life unexplained mysterious death.
chinese_title: 37号房间：约翰尼·雷德斯神秘之死
foreign_title: Room 37 - The Mysterious Death of Johnny Thunders
